preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: PHP-Sugar is a PHP templating engine aimed at being powerful, easy and safe to use, and fast.

chapter.title: Templates
chapter.para: PHP-Sugar process template files, which generally end in the .tpl extension. Template files are mostly regular HTML, with special markup for Sugar expressions.
